title: Hayden Panettiere Travels To Ukraine To See 4-Year-Old Daughter Who Lives With Wladimir Klitschko
text:
Hayden Panettiere has to fly to Ukraine to see her daughter Kaya, who lives there with the actress’ ex.

According to US Weekly the “Nashville” actress frequently flies overseas to visit her 4-year-old, who lives there with her father, Wladimir Klitschko.

A source told the outlet, “Hayden frequently travels [there] to see her daughter” and said she FaceTimes with her daughter often.

Panettiere has not had custody of her daughter since splitting with Klitschko in August 2018.

Related:

Hayden Panettiere's Ex-Boyfriend's Domestic Violence Charges Dropped After She Refuses To Cooperate

Hayden Panettiere's 4-Year-Old Daughter Lives in Ukraine With Ex Wladimir Klitschko

Hayden Panettiere No Shoes, All Smiles

Back in June, People broke the news that Kaya had not been living with the actress since the breakup.

They reported Kaya had been living with her father while Panettiere has been in Los Angeles. A source said, “Her life is in flux with her daughter living away, and she has other issues weighing on her mind.”

The “Nashville” actress and the former professional boxer started dating in 2009. They split in 2011 but reunited in 2013. The two eventually got engaged and had their daughter in 2014.

She last posted a photo of her daughter back in February with the caption, “Sweet moments with sleeping babes ❤️”
